name: SuperStar OH MY GIRL
description:
Found You, SuperStar OH MY GIRL!
You're invited to the rhythmic secret garden with OH MY GIRL

Weekly OH MY GIRL Song & Card Theme Update
- One of the best discographies out there! Meet OH MY GIRL tracks every week!
- New Theme Cards to be updated every week

Weekly League / World Record Competition with Global Players
- Get up to the higher places into the upper tier in Weekly League
- Become the best player for each song! Challenge for World Record, get special rewards

Exclusive SuperStar OH MY GIRL Contents
- Special and exclusive set of OH MY GIRL contents through Live Theme!
- Complete your collection with SuperStar exclusive contents

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Application Permission Usage Notice]
We are requesting for access permissions to provide services as below.
Required Access Permissions
Camera/Storage: For saving the game data in your storage
Read, write on external storage: For saving settings and music data cache
Device ID and phone calls: For tracking and analyzing advertisement records and creating tokens for push notifications
Wi-Fi connection information: For sending guide messages upon downloading additional data
ID: For creating and confirming user accounts


[Access Permission Revoke]
Settings > SuperStar OH MY GIRL> Access Agree or Access Revoke

※ Visual Setting
If you experience lags in the game you can change your visual setting to low resolution for better performance.

※ While SuperStar OH MY GIRL is available for free, you will get charged upon purchases of certain paid items.

※ If you have any inquiries or require any further information, please contact us at.
E-MAIL: support.superstar.ohmygirl@dalcomsoft.com

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SuperStar OH MY GIRL Dalcomsoft Contact Information
Email: support.superstar.ohmygirl@dalcomsoft.com
